formula: E.g.f.: exp(arctan(x)).a(n) = n!*sum(if oddp(m+n) then 0 else (-1)^((3*n+m)/2)/(2^m*m!)*sum(2^i*binomial(n-1,i-1)*m!/i!*stirling1(i,m),i,m,n),m,1,n), n>0. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Aug 05 2010E.g.f.: exp(arctan(x))=1+2x/(H(0)-x); H(k)=4k+2+x^2*(4k^2+8k+5)/H(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 15 2011a(n+1) = a(n) - a(n-1) * A002378(n-2). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 27 2012E.g.f.: -2i*(B((1+ix)/2; (2-i)/2, (2+i)/2) - B(1/2; (2-i)/2, (2+i)/2)), for a(0)=0, a(1)=a(2)=a(3)=1, B(x;a,b) is the incomplete Beta function. - _G. C. Greubel_, May 01 2015
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==1,a[1]==1,a[n]==a[n-1]-(n-1)(n-2)a[n-2]}, a[n],{n,30}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 02 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[E^(ArcTan[x]),{x,0,20}],x]*Range[0,20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 06 2014 *)
